page.title: 03WAY OF LIFE(cont.)
page.content:
minutes to{Victoria}or{London Bridge {at a cost of nearly }Â£1000 a year.
The majority of people rely on a car for transport as the bus service linking{Smallfield} with{Horley, {Crawley }and {East Grinstead }is most infrequent_ 2 hourly,and none in the evenings or on Sundays. There are few shops, supermarkets, butchers,greengrocers in {Smallfield, but for main shopping, people travel into{Horley,Crawley}or{East Grinstead. For entertainment they often travel further afield -{Croydon}and{London} for the cinema and theatre. The majority of people own a TV, and about 25% have a video, 20% have a computer.
